register.userDescription: The user for whom the birthday is created - MANAGER ONLY.
register.alreadyRegistered_target: This user's birthday is already registered. If you want to change it, use {{command}}
register.alreadyRegistered_author: Your birthday is already registered. If you want to change it, use {{command}}
register.hasNotPermissionManagesRoles: You don't have permission to register birthdays
register.hasNotPermissionToManageThisUser: You don't have permission to register this user's birthday.
register.notCreated: The birthday could not be created. Please try again later.

remove.userDescription: Remove a Birthday for a Person - MANAGER ONLY
remove.hasNotPermissionManagesRoles: You don't have permission to remove birthdays
remove.hasNotPermissionToManageThisUser: You don't have permission to remove this user's birthday.

show.userDescription: Show a Birthday for a Person - MANAGER ONLY
show.title: {{emoji}} Birthday
show.notRegistered_author: Your birthday is not registered. Use {{command}} to register it.

update.userDescription: The user for whom the birthday is updated - MANAGER ONLY.
update.hasNotPermissionManagesRoles: You don't have permission to update birthdays
update.hasNotPermissionToManageThisUser: You don't have permission to update this user's birthday.
update.success_author: Your birthday was successfully updated at the {{date}}.
update.success_target: {{target}}'s birthday was successfully updated at the {{date}}.
update.notRegistered_author: Your birthday is not registered. Use {{command}} to register it.
update.notUpdated: The birthday could not be updated. Please try again later.

test.userDescription: Test a Birthday for a Person - MANAGER ONLY
